original: Ljung, Sven Otto, kyrkoherde, Ve-inge, f. 19/1/97 i Fritsla, Älvsb. 1., av kommin. Claes L. o. Elisabeth Ekström. G. 31 m. Anita Berger. Barn: Göran f. 33, Gunilla 38, Claes-Lennart 45, Eva 47. — Stud :ex. i Lund 21, teol. fil. ex. 23, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Gbgs stift 27. V. past. i Slättåkra 27, v. kommin. i Halmstad 28, kommin. i Torshälla 29, kyrkoadj. i Halmstad 29, fäng:pred. där 29-33 o. las :pred. 38-42, kyrkoh. i Veinge o. Tjärby sed. 41. Sv. kyrkans miss:- styr. ombud, ombud f. Sv. kyrkans sjöm:vård i Halmstads o. Laholms kontr., ordf. i Halmstads kyrkl. sjöm:-vård, i pastoratsfullm., kyrkofuHm. o. folkskrstyr. i Veinge, insp. f. Tjärby kommuns skola f. yrkesundervisn. Skr.: Till prosten Richard Conricus’ minne, predikn. i Aftonsångspostilla årg. I o. n samt i En sv. kyrkopo-stiLla, Kyrkl. o. relig. förhåll, i Halmstad (46).
translated: Ljung, Sven Otto, pastor, Veinge, born 19/1/97 in Fritsla, Älvsborg County, son of vicar Claes L. and Elisabeth Ekström. Married on 31st with Anita Berger. Children: Göran born in 1933, Gunilla in 1938, Claes-Lennart in 1945, Eva in 1947. Completed the theological exam in Lund in 1921, theology bachelor's degree in 1923, ordained as a priest for the Diocese of Gothenburg in 1927 after completing practical theological examinations and priest training. Worked as a curate in Slättåkra in 1927, assistant vicar in Halmstad in 1928, curate in Torshälla in 1929, church administrator in Halmstad in 1929, prison chaplain in Halmstad from 1929-1933 and from 1938-1942, parish priest in Veinge and Tjärby since 1941. Representative for Swedish Church Missionary Board, representative for Swedish Church's seafarer's care in Halmstad and Laholm, chairman of Halmstad's church seafarer's care, pastor's board member, church council member and school board member in Veinge, inspector for Tjärby municipality's vocational education school. Writings: In Memory of Provost Richard Conricus, sermons in Aftonsångspostilla, various articles on church and religious matters in Halmstad (1946).

author.name: Predikn. i Aftonsångspostilla årg. I o. n
Kyrkl. o. relig. förhåll, i Halmstad
